channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Mega Addons For WPBakery Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Mega Addons For WPBakery Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2023-0268|2024-08-02T05:02:44.058Z -- unknown -- mega%20addons%20for%20wpbakery%20page%20builder
item.description: The Mega Addons For WPBakery Page Builder WordPress plugin before 4.3.0 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
